nodes.text: The Zona Miki system was located in the Thrasybule sector, a part of the Trans-Hydian portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It shared its name with the hyperlane known as the Zona Miki route.
The Zona Miki system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square P-6.
